nodes.text: The Corellian Medal of Honor was a medal that could be awarded to CorSec members.

One was given to Lieutenant Colonel Wilfred Quelsh, when he revealed that his fellow CorSec officer, Kal Braggan, was corrupt. However, Braggan was innocent and Quelsh killed him several years later when Braggan confronted him. Quelsh lost his medal in the brawl and Major Alana Walden tasked a spacer to recover it. The spacer found the medal near Braggan"s corpse and eventually discovered the truth.

The Corellian Medal of Honor appeared in the 2003 video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011. The Corellian Medal of Honor was added to the game with the update named "Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives", published on June 8, 2006.
